mapper.sql: pid, pname, pdesc, pimg, update_time, update_by, level, recommend, create_time, status, remark
mapper.select:
select count(pid) from td_painter where 1=1
and pid=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from td_painter where 1=1
and pid=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by create_time asc
order by level desc
order by recommend desc
order by create_time desc
